thread.title: Patriots will try to stop Greg Hardy in DL's Dallas debut
thread.title_full: Patriots will try to stop Greg Hardy in DL's Dallas debut

title: Patriots will try to stop Greg Hardy in DL's Dallas debut
text:
> Texas Patriots will try to stop Greg Hardy in DL's Dallas debut New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady, right, tosses the ball to running back Brandon Bolden during an NFL football practice in Foxborough, Mass., Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. The Patriots will travel to Dallas to face the Cowboys on Sunday.(AP Photo/Charles Krupa)
